attributes.action: Force Local Councils To Bring In Parking Machines That Give Change
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is so frustrating when I park up in a pay and display car park and find the machines require EXACT change with no notes. Some fussy machines even refuse to accept £2 coins. It is about time all councils should provide change-giving parking machines or attendant booths where you can get change like in the arcades.
